title: Problems with game crashing after champ select please help!?!?!?!?
body: I have been having a problem sense yesterday because my PC updated windows 10 and now my league crashes after I go threw champ select, if anyone knows how to fix it i would love some help. I have already gone threw the standard bug splat stuff.

replies.body: I want to help but I need more information on this issue.  What do you mean by crashing, and are you receiving any error messages?  Is it actually a bugsplat error?  Know what is happening and when can help figure this out.  Let me know!

YES  it is a bugsplat error and it only started happening after i got the update to my pc and i went threw all the recommended stuff by riot support and I sent a few error reports in and yet it still has not been fixed.

I'm not sure what you mean by recommended stuff by riot support, and I don't see any tickets open.  It does sound like you might be having driver or hardware issues that's causing the game to not render properly, but it could also be a result of bad game files.  It's really important that you go through each and every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out any possibilities and get this fixed.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with that.  Good luck!
I have also sent in a ticked
Sorry about my wording the game crash steps and hextech repair tool are what i mean by that riot support stuff sorry for not being clear.
What does unknown error mean? I got an "unknown error has occurred" after champ select and no I did not experience any packet loss.
